Quite an interesting method, I had heard of this a while ago, but never act=
ually attempted it.=A0 I will definately be trying it soon . . . Someone pr=
obably was whispering in your ear!=A0 I'm always fascinated by the way thin=
gs come together in this line of work.=A0 Everything from the people we wor=
k with to the information we share with one another!=A0 Thank you so much!
=

this method. So glad I was paying attenti=
on. And I'm glad I was able to overcome my 
technical challenges ... having=
 never transferred video to a computer before, nor worked 
with any video s=
oftware, it was a bit of an uphill battle for me in the beginning. LOL - it=
 
took me hours, not kidding, to figure out how to make and convert the vid=
eo for YouTube. 
Thank goodness old dogs actually can learn new tricks. ;-)=


Margaret
